else if(useItemID == 451 && atObjectID == 2781)//rune smelt { if(playerLevel[13] >= 99) { deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1); setAnimation(899); sendMessage("You smelt the rune ore and recieve a rune bar"); addItem(2363, 1); addSkillXP(1500, 13); } else sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 99 to smelt rune"); }

item.title: What's wrong with my smelting code?
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

[s]Shown below is my code for rune smelting…the actual smelting works, just not the lvl requirements. No errors on compile or run.

else if(useItemID == 451 && atObjectID == 2781)//rune smelt { deleteItem(451, getItemSlot(451), 1); setAnimation(899); sendMessage("You smelt the rune ore and recieve a rune bar"); addItem(2363, 1); addSkillXP(1500, 13); if(playerLevel[13] >= 99) { } else sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 99 to smelt rune"); }[/s]

Haha…I feel very foolish but um…sighs cough I er…had 2 codes using the same object…duplicates, or whatever…deleted it and now it works o_O Sorry for wasting you guys’ time

Read full topic
